text:
Hi all,
I need to perform a search using an input text field, on 2 richtext columns of a HubDB table; I have tried everything but I can't get results on both columns. The search query is this:
{% set query = query ~ "&question__icontains="~request.query_dict.search|urlencode ~ "&answer__icontains="~request.query_dict.search|urlencode %}
where "request.query_dict.search|urlencode" is the input field where the user types in the text to be searched for
Thanks

I would appreciate your help. I want to filter HubDB rows with an event start date over 30 days from today. Here is code that does not work {% if (row[“start_date”] != null)  & (row[“start_date”] > today()+30days) %}. Any suggestions?

Anyone know how to make a testimonial slider with arrows to navigate?? I tried copying one from a HubSpot dev online but they used Owl Carousel 1.3, and theyre up to version 2 now.. Its not workin :')
